alert.note: Alert for Greensville; Southampton; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 6:33PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT GREENSVILLE...WEST CENTRAL SOUTHAMPTON AND SOUTHWESTERN SUSSEX COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF EMPORIA THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 633 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Emporia, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small trees and blow around unsecured objects. Wind impacting handling of high profile vehicles. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Emporia around 640 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Brink, Adams Grove, Grizzard, Bufford Crossroads, Lanes Corner, Pleasant Shade, Fields Crossroads, Emporia Reservoir, Cowie Corner, and Mason. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
